publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1437# Mr Jamie Stone: Economy of Highlands and Islands-That the Parliament notes the valuable role which Highlands and Islands Enterprise has placed in stimulating economic growth in vulnerable and remote communities in the Highlands and Islands and recognises that further investment is still required in the most economically fragile areas.

S1M-1437# Mr Jamie Stone: Economy of Highlands and Islands-That the Parliament notes the valuable role which Highlands and Islands Enterprise has placed in stimulating economic growth in vulnerable and remote communities in the Highlands and Islands and recognises that further investment is still required in the most economically fragile areas.
S1M-1437# Economy of Highlands and Islands (lodged on 6 December 2000) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1437# Mr Jamie Stone: Economy of Highlands and Islands-That the Parliament notes the valuable role which Highlands and Islands Enterprise has placed in stimulating economic growth in vulnerable and remote communities in the Highlands and Islands and recognises that further investment is still required in the most economically fragile areas. Supported by: Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1437# Economy of Highlands and Islands (lodged on 6 December 2000) Robin Harper*
S1M-1437# Economy of Highlands and Islands (lodged on 6 December 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-1437# Mr Jamie Stone: Economy of Highlands and Islands—That the Parliament notes the valuable role which Highlands and Islands Enterprise has placed in stimulating economic growth in vulnerable and remote communities in the Highlands and Islands and recognises that further investment is still required in the most economically fragile areas. Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-1437# Economy of Highlands and Islands (lodged on 6 December 2000) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-1437# Mr Jamie Stone: Economy of Highlands and Islands—That the Parliament notes the valuable role which Highlands and Islands Enterprise has placed in stimulating economic growth in vulnerable and remote communities in the Highlands and Islands and recognises that further investment is still required in the most economically fragile areas. Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Donald Gorrie

Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Donald Gorrie

Supported by: Nora Radcliffe, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Donald Gorrie
